welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Orchards, a charming city known for its picturesque orchards and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse primarily serves Alaska Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: This concourse primarily serves United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: This concourse primarily serves Southwest Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Troutdale Airport provides exclusive services for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Portland Airport, where most domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo shipments at Portland Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with unlimited access.
